remarks: Lemma for ~ ovolun .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jun-2014.)
statement:
ovolun.a $e |- ( ph -> ( A C_ RR /\ ( vol* ` A ) e. RR ) ) $.
ovolun.b $e |- ( ph -> ( B C_ RR /\ ( vol* ` B ) e. RR ) ) $.
ovolun.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR+ ) $.
ovolunlem2 $p |- ( ph -> ( vol* ` ( A u. B ) ) <_ ( ( ( vol* ` A ) + ( vol* ` B ) ) + C ) ) $.
